data.description:
[foolery] Updating Foolery runtime from acartine/foolery (latest)...
[foolery-install] Downloading runtime artifact: foolery-runtime-darwin-arm64.tar.gz
[foolery-install] Source: https://github.com/acartine/foolery/releases/latest/download/foolery-runtime-darwin-arm64.tar.gz
[foolery-install] Writing launcher to /Users/cartine/.local/bin/foolery
[foolery-install] Install complete
[foolery-install] Commands: foolery start | foolery open | foolery update | foolery stop | foolery restart | foolery status | foolery uninstall
[foolery-install] Launcher is on PATH.
[foolery-install] Get started: foolery
[foolery-install] Log files default to: /Users/cartine/.local/state/foolery/logs
[foolery] Update complete. reports update complete but then fails to execute launcher due to shell parse error: /Users/cartine/.local/bin/foolery line 570 near unexpected token ;;. Repro from installer output in user report.
